name: FOCAL_COLOR_PORTRAIT
prompt_base: Studio fashion editorial, close-up portrait, elegant lighting from the side. Clean dark-to-light gradient background, minimalist tone, luxury ambiance. Female model with slicked-back hair, eyes closed, chin slightly lifted. Hand gently touching collarbone. Statement emerald-cut emerald necklace at the center of chest  Matching emerald ring on hand near collarbone  Drop earring visible on lit side Light gleam catching on gem facets, high sharpness on product, subtle shine on lips, smooth background gradient. Jewelry set in platinum, emerald center stone surrounded by pav√© diamonds. Design is vintage-inspired with geometric cuts and strong symmetry.
negative_prompt: No background props, no distracting makeup, no color on lips or skin, no extra jewelry outside of main set
